name: Subliminal (Rain Baldridge)
description:
Title: Subliminal

 Platform: PC 

Game Genre: 3D,  Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: You are stuck in a strange space. You don't know where you are, so take the opportunity to explore your surroundings while ignoring the strange feeling of being followed. 

Instructions: Move with WASD, press SPACE bar to jump, use mouse to look around. Navigate the rooms and hallways. 

Game Design Team: Rain Baldridge - Game Designer
